1.0.0.name: wordpress/sidebar-adder
1.0.0.description:
Sidebar Adder follows the keep it simple mantra. It leverages wordpress' built-in features. It uses page option for the additition and updation of sidebar. Its simple yet flexible.

Features:

  • Adds sidebar to the admin section.
  • Updates variour option of sidebar.
  • Easy to use and updat.
